    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_91188</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Friction, pressure, and turning force</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion, Druck und drehenkraft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Frottement, pression, et force de rotation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fricção, pressão, e força de giro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrito, pressione e forza di rotazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τριβή, πίεση, και γυρίζοντας δύναμη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fricción, presión, y fuerza que da vuelta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows a drawing pin, a bicycle wheel and a spanner illustrating the concepts of pressure, friction, and turning force respectively.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bicycle wheel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">drawing pin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spanner</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">turning force</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt einen zeichnenden Stift, 
ein Fahrradrad und einen Schlüssel, welche die Konzepte des Drucks, 
Friktion veranschaulichen und Kraft beziehungsweise drehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre une broche de dessin, une 
roue de bicyclette et une clé illustrant les concepts de la pression,
frottement, et tournant la force respectivement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra um pino desenhando, uma roda
de bicicleta e uma chave de boca ilustrando os conceitos da pressão, 
fricção, e girando a força respectivamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra un perno dissipante, una 
rotella di bicicletta e una chiave illustranti i concetti di 
pressione, attrito e giranti la forza rispettivamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει μια καρφίτσα σχεδίων, μια
ρόδα ποδηλάτων και ένα κλειδί που επεξηγούν τις έννοιες της 
πίεσης, τριβή, και που γυρίζουν τη δύναμη αντίστοιχα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra a un contacto que traza, a 
una rueda de bicicleta y a llave de tuercas ilustrando los conceptos 
de la presión, fricción, y dando vuelta a la fuerza respectivamente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fahrradrad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zeichnender Stift</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräfte</string>
          </keyword>
